snippet: Amanda Palmer, a singer, keyboardist and occasional ukulele player, began raising money on Monday, asking for $100,000; also, advertiser groups say they will act on "rogue sites." And more.
abstract: Amanda Palmer, a singer, keyboardist and occasional ukulele player, began raising money on Monday, asking for $100,000; also, advertiser groups say they will act on "rogue sites." And more.

headline.main: Digital Notes: Singer Raises $450,000 on Kickstarter for Her Album
